item.description:
We will be joining Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on a group adventure to China!

This tour is now closed

Join your fellow travel club members November 6 - 18, 2011 on this exciting 13 day adventure to China: Beijing, Xian, Yangtze River & Shanghai ! Starting and ending with a direct group flight from the New York area to/from China, we will visit the Great Wall of China, the famous Terracotta Warriors, and take a 4 day cruise down the stunningly beautiful Yangtze River. We'll also see the amazing Three Gorges Dam, visit the Forbidden City of Beijing and the famous Tiananmen Square, and check out the vibrant city of Shanghai! All in the comfort of 4 star hotels and boats.

This group trip is an awesome way to experience the beauty and history of China with a group of fun, like-minded adventurers.

Want to see what other club members are saying? Then check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonial Page.

Price: $2,399, pp plus airfare

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

(NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip)

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Included in the awesome adventure:
* 8 nights in 4 star hotels
* 3 nights in a 4 star river cruise boat on Yangtze River
* International and domestic airfare (economy class) - mandatory add-on
* Guided tours as mentioned in itinerary with expert English speaking local guides
* Global Expeditions Club English speaking Trip Leader for entire trip starting/ending in the US
* All meals, as indicated in itinerary
* Entrance fees to all sites as indicated on the itinerary
* All transfers as indicated in modern air-conditioned vehicles

Places Visited: China Group Tour, Beijing, Xian, Shanghai, Great Wall of China, Terracotta Warriors, Yangtze River Cruise, Three Gorges Dam, Forbidden City, Tiananmen Square, Chongqing

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This group tour is being organized by the Global Expeditions Club: an international adventure travel club with over 11,000+ members. The tour operator that they are using to coordinate, book and run this trip is: Head Out Adventures. For more information visit their websites or contact the Global Expeditions Club at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

And, of course, if you have any questions you can always contact me or one of the other organizers through a meetup email!!

Make Friends. Travel the World®
item.name: China: Beijing, Xian, Yangtze River & Shanghai - 13 Days
